title: Conflict found, Content <file name> with version <number> can't be installed because a different version is already installing
content:
During a capsule installation, if you try to install the same or a different version of the capsule, the system displays a conflict error message and the second request stops:

Conflict found, Content <file name> with version <number> cannot be installed because it's already installing or uploading.
or
Conflict found, Content <file name> with version <number> cannot be installed because a different version is already installing.

Cause

This is a default procedure in Content Store.

Solution

Wait for the first capsule installation request to complete and then try to install the same or different version of the capsule again.
